GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the comments table, requires existing username and comment body

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article of the given article_id

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array with comments from the requested article_id
